::GoldenEye::
She walked with Dollen. "I hope so love, I hope so."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> (Sorry anybody who has been waiting for my characters to do stuff, 
I have been REAL busy lately, things have been going on, and I 
haven't had any precious time to post.  I'll catch up on some stuff, 
and try my best to post more frequently, also, somebody said they 
needed me for their story, who was it??)
> 
> ::Wheeljack::
> 
>      Wheeljack nodded to Gotron.
> 
>       "Yap, we better get it back to base as soon as possible," He 
said.
> 
>      Wheeljack stomped over to one end of the probe, and lifted it 
up with his head.
> 
>       "Ok, now, can you get the other side?" He asked.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Dollen::
> 
>      Dollen and GoldenEye walked back to Phobia and the others(They 
are walking hand in hand right, so I'm assuming GoldenEye's coming?).
> 
>      "You know love, I think things are going to turn out just 
fine," He said, holding her hand.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Lavacons::
> 
>       Astral flew up into the air, and ordered for the others to 
follow.
> 
>          "We get to kill!!!!  Let's go do some killing!!" They all 
said, following Starscream.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Hakibuscon::
> 
>       The battle was over.  And he was never noticed.  Hakibuscon 
walked away.  Maybe, he could find a better body, any male body would 
do.  He transformed to snake mode and slithered off, hoping to find 
another body to transfer his spark into.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>          Skulletron's optics started to open, slowly.  He got up.  
He still couldn't see very well.  He wasn't aware of his being inside 
the Maximal base, and he wasn't aware of who he was real good 
either.  Skulletron felt around, and stumbled a bit.
> 
>       "Ugghhh.....Where am I???" He said, trying to see things a 
little more clearer.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Decadel::
> 
>         Decadel sat in his underground lair, in his comfy chair.  
Man, he had to find a way to wipe out these fools!!  He slammed his 
fist on the arm of the chair, and then grinned evilly.  Uh oh, he had 
a plan.
